Joins.Name: reports.VPersonGroup
Joins.Title: Groups
Joins.Expression: LEFT JOIN reports.VPersonGroup AS G ON P.UserIdentifier = G.UserIdentifier

Joins.Name: reports.VPersonAchievement
Joins.Title: Achievements and Credentials
Joins.Expression: LEFT JOIN reports.VPersonAchievement AS A ON P.UserIdentifier = A.UserIdentifier

Joins.Name: reports.VPersonAttempt
Joins.Title: Assessment Attempts
Joins.Expression: LEFT JOIN reports.VPersonAttempt AS T ON P.UserIdentifier = T.UserIdentifier

Joins.Name: reports.VPersonEventRegistration
Joins.Title: Event Registrations
Joins.Expression: LEFT JOIN reports.VPersonEventRegistration AS R ON P.UserIdentifier = R.RegistrationCandidateIdentifier

Joins.Name: reports.VPersonGradebookScore
Joins.Title: Gradebook Scores
Joins.Expression: LEFT JOIN reports.VPersonGradebookScore AS S ON P.UserIdentifier = S.UserIdentifier
